name: Ellie Language
description: A type-safe programming language designed for embedded and sandboxed environments (WebAssembly, ARM) with focus on performance and safety.
longDescription: Ellie is a compiled programming language that I built from scratch, featuring a complete parser, compiler, and virtual machine. It's designed for embedded systems and WebAssembly targets with advanced memory management, stack/heap allocation, garbage collection, and bytecode optimization.

name: UtilStation
description: Your one-stop shop for all development tools - a comprehensive collection of utilities for various programming situations.
longDescription: UtilStation provides developers with a unified platform containing all the tools they need in one single app. From JSON formatters to regex testers, color pickers to code converters - everything a developer needs in their daily workflow.

name: Wole App
description: Wake-On-Lan Magic Package Generator & Sender Android App for remote device management.
longDescription: Android application built with Flutter that allows users to send Wake-On-LAN magic packets to remotely wake up devices on their network. Features a clean interface for managing multiple devices and network configurations.

name: Wole CLI
description: Wake-On-Lan Magic Package Generator & Sender command-line interface tool.
longDescription: Command-line tool written in Rust for sending Wake-On-LAN magic packets. Provides a fast and efficient way to remotely wake up devices on your network from the terminal.

name: event_listener
description: NodeJS-like Event Listener library for Dart programming language.
longDescription: A Dart library that brings familiar Node.js-style event handling to Dart applications. Provides an easy-to-use API for implementing event-driven programming patterns in Dart projects.

name: Bnots
description: A note-taking app that combines simplicity with Markdown support for enhanced writing experience.
longDescription: Note-taking application built with Flutter that features Markdown support, clean interface, and cross-platform compatibility. Designed for users who want a simple yet powerful tool for organizing their thoughts and documents.

name: Menemen
description: A streaming HTTP/HTTPS request library for high-performance network operations.
longDescription: Rust library designed for efficient streaming HTTP/HTTPS requests with focus on performance and memory efficiency. Built for applications that need to handle large-scale network operations with minimal overhead.

name: SafeEn
description: Local database solution for situations that require strict data integrity and absolute portability.
longDescription: A Rust-based database solution focused on data integrity, security, and portability. Designed for applications that need reliable local storage with strong consistency guarantees and easy deployment across different environments.

name: Rust-NMEA
description: Rust NMEA parser for maritime and GPS applications with high performance and accuracy.
longDescription: A robust Rust library for parsing NMEA 0183 protocol messages commonly used in maritime and GPS applications. Features comprehensive sentence support, error handling, and efficient parsing for real-time applications.

name: Device-Database
description: A JavaScript library that detects and identifies various development boards and IoT devices.
longDescription: JavaScript library designed to detect and identify different types of development boards, microcontrollers, and IoT devices. Useful for development tools and applications that need to interact with various hardware platforms.

name: rpifan
description: Automatic fan controller service for Raspberry Pi to manage temperature and cooling.
longDescription: A Node.js service that automatically controls cooling fans on Raspberry Pi based on CPU temperature. Features configurable temperature thresholds, smooth fan speed control, and system integration for optimal thermal management.
